title: [Large-Scale] Workshop for Strengthening Digital Educational Resource Evaluation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and elementary science teaching experience
context.additional_context: Focused on assessment competency enhancement in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments, combining offline discussions with online practical training

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the pedagogical suitability of elementary science digital resources using rubrics
Learners can evaluate interactivity, content accuracy, and accessibility of digital resources using a 5-point scale rubric
Learners can propose improvement strategies based on peer assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
